job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer Networking
job.description: RESOLVITBringing Solutions That Make Business BetterJoin Resolvit as a Software Engineer and be part of a creative, forward-thinking team. Our success at deploying skilled, highly knowledgeable experts has landed us on the Inc. 5000 list of America’s fastest-growing companies four times – and we’re just getting started.As the Software Engineer, you will work with the remote development and support teams to contribute to all aspects related to the enhancement and maintenance of our software. You will develop software, guide work, assist with planning of new projects, and troubleshoot any problems that occur. You will also report directly to the CTO. Additionally, you will:Actively participate in the development, analysis, and testing of web applications and databasesCollaborate with remote teams to identify and fix technical issuesAnalyze users’ needs and work on features to satisfy themCoordinate support related tasks with the support teamDevelop and maintain websitesWhat You’ll Need to be Successful:At least 2 years of experience as a software developer (front end and back end)At least 2 years of experience with Azure SQL Server (preferred) or Microsoft SQL ServerAt least 1 year of experience with tools like PHP, CSS, and JavaScriptBachelor’s degree in a STEM field (preferably computer science related) or equivalent experience or trainingExperience working on a software development team doing modern web application developmentExperience working in an Azure development environment with C# and GitAbility to create APIs to integrate product featuresStrong communication, motivational, and interpersonal skillsGreat Additional Skills:Banking and/or FinTech experienceKnowledge of WordPressExperience working with Azure DevOpsExperience in website administrationExperience working with Twilio’s platformExperience developing mobile applicationsBenefits:At Resolvit, you’ll be given the support you need to grow in your consulting career. In addition to opportunities for advancement, we offer:Medical, dental, and vision insuranceLife insurance coverageLong-term and short-term disability coverage401(k) retirement plan with matchingProfessional support from our Client & Employee Optimization SpecialistWe currently have more than 100 open career opportunities across the country, so be sure to mention the appropriate Job Code with any correspondence!About Resolvit:Resolvit is an international technology consulting firm with industry-leading customers in the financial services, high tech, manufacturing, retail, life sciences, and government sectors. Through its partnerships, Resolvit delivers highly impactful, innovative solutions across five core areas: Infrastructure Modernization, Application Development Services, Enterprise Data Management & Analytics, Knowledge & Content Management, and Strategic Staffing.
